definition: inferior in rank or status, larceny of property having a value less than some amount
details:
adjective
- inferior in rank or status
= synonyms: secondary
- contemptibly narrow in outlook
= example: contemptibly narrow in outlook
= synonyms: small-minded
- (informal) small and of little importance
= synonyms: little
noun
- larceny of property having a value less than some amount
= example: larceny of property having a value less than some amount
= synonyms: petit larceny
